content.eamr: ( ing-3 "2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast" )

content.text: 0) In a large mixing bowl, combine 3 cups flour, cheese, sugar, yeast and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@27:34 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "3 cups flour"@35:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "cheese"@49:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "sugar"@57:62 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "yeast"@64:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "salt"@74:78 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large mixing bowl"@6:25 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add milk and egg; beat on low speed until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "milk"@7:11 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "egg"@16:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "beat"@21:25 / AC
		:mnr ( "on low speed"@29:38 / OTHER )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until smooth"@39:51 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Stir in enough remaining flour to form a soft dough.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "enough remaining flour"@11:33 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-2-0 "to form a soft dough"@34:54 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Turn"@3:7 / AC
		:gol ( tool-3-0 "a floured surface"@13:30 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "knead"@32:37 / AC
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until smooth and elastic"@38:62 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "6-8 minutes"@70:81 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top.
5) Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Cover and let rise"@3:21 / AC
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a warm place"@25:37 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until doubled"@38:51 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "1 hour"@59:65 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Divide in half and shape into two loaves.
9) Cover and let rise until doubled, about 45 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Cover and let rise"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-9-0 "until doubled"@23:36 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "45 minutes"@44:54 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:heat ( temp-10-0 "375 degrees F"@12:25 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-10-0 "25-30 minutes"@30:43 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-10-0 "until golden brown"@47:65 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Remove from pans to cool on wire racks.
